name: THE List - Multiplayers
description:
Challenge your friends online in this new crazy trivia game!

Discover millions of questions and get more point than your opponent to win the match. Play online against your friends or random real players. Win coins and experience quickly and make it amongst your friends and worldwide!

Will you succeed to end THE List?

● Play against real players online
● Discover millions of questions
● Win Jokers, XP and Coins
● Chat with your friends
